summary: Web-based note converter application called 'Scriptify Notes' - accepts screenshots, extracts text via OCR, applies handwriting-style rendering with randomization, converts images to sketch style, and generates downloadable PDFs. Built as a progressive web app using React frontend and Motoko backend on Internet Computer with Internet Identity authentication.
architectural_notes: React + TypeScript frontend for cross-platform web compatibility
Motoko backend on Internet Computer for decentralized storage
Client-side OCR using Tesseract.js for text extraction
Canvas API for image-to-sketch conversion (edge detection, filters)
jsPDF or pdf-lib for client-side PDF generation
Progressive Web App approach for mobile browser support
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Notebook paper texture background with subtle ruled lines for handwriting rendering (notebook-texture.dim_1200x1600.png)
- Pencil sketch texture overlay for image-to-sketch conversion effect (pencil-texture.dim_800x800.png)
- Application icon featuring a stylized handwritten note or pen illustration (app-icon.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Implement image upload interface that accepts PNG and JPG screenshot files with maximum file size of 10MB and validates file types before upload
Integrate Tesseract.js for client-side OCR to extract text from uploaded screenshots, returning structured data including headings, paragraphs, lists, and tables

Build handwriting rendering engine that converts extracted text into realistic handwritten style with randomized character spacing, letter rotation between -2° and +2°, baseline shift variations, and stroke thickness changes
Implement handwriting customization UI allowing users to choose between blue and black ink colors, and select paper backgrounds including ruled paper, graph paper, and margin lines
Implement A4 PDF generation at 300 DPI using jsPDF or pdf-lib that combines handwritten text rendering and converted sketch images with proper multi-page support and line wrapping
Create PDF preview screen that displays the generated PDF before download and includes a download button for saving the file locally
Integrate Internet Identity authentication for user sign-in, replacing Google Sign-In while maintaining secure user sessions
Create note history interface that displays user's previously converted notes with filenames and creation timestamps

Design a cohesive visual theme with warm, creative colors (avoiding blue and purple), notebook-inspired typography, and paper texture elements that reflect the handwritten note aesthetic throughout the application interface

new_feature_requests.summary: Client-side OCR text extraction using Tesseract.js
Handwriting-style text rendering with character randomization (spacing, rotation, baseline shift)
Image-to-sketch conversion using Canvas API filters (edge detection, grayscale, noise)
PDF generation with handwritten text and sketch images using jsPDF/pdf-lib
Note storage in Motoko backend canister
Create image region detection using Canvas API to segment diagram and image areas from text regions in uploaded screenshots

Build image-to-sketch conversion pipeline using Canvas API that converts detected images to grayscale, applies Canny-style edge detection, applies adaptive threshold, removes digital colors, adds Gaussian noise, and overlays pencil texture to create hand-drawn appearance
Build backend note storage system in Motoko that stores note metadata including user ID, filename, creation timestamp, and associates generated PDFs with user accounts
